pinyin: xiao1 shou4 shi2 dian3 qing2 bao4 xi4 tong3

sentences.english: Xinmin Bao was one of the largest folk newspapers in China before 1949.
sentences.chinese: 《新民報》是解放前中國最大的民間報系之一。

sentences.english: Moneyweek is affiliated with Nanfang Daily Media Group and an important member of 21st Century Media.
sentences.chinese: 隸屬於南方報業傳媒集團，爲21世紀報系重要成員。
